text: Louis Van de Perck was a archer from Belgium. Perck competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics and won four medals.Louis VAN DE PERCK He was born on 14 October 1889 and died on 30 November 1953.Louis Van De Perck == References == Category:1889 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Belgian archers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Belgium
title: Louis Van de Perck
